- Crafting data

- Share it!

### Resources

- *Data Feminism* — Catherine D’Ignazio & Lauren F. Klein (2023). MIT Press.  
  Open access: <https://data-feminism.mitpress.mit.edu/>

- CARE Principles for Indigenous Data Governance — Global Indigenous Data Alliance (2019).  
  <https://www.gida-global.org/care>

- “Data Epistemologies, the Coloniality of Power, and Resistance” — P. Ricaurte (2019). *Television & New Media*, 20(4), 350–365.  
  <https://doi.org/10.1177/1527476419831640>

- Linked Art — Linked Art Community.  
  <https://linked.art/>

- CIDOC-CRM, Version 7.3 — CIDOC CRM Special Interest Group.  
  <https://cidoc-crm.org/Version/version-7.3>

- “The FAIR Guiding Principles for scientific data management and stewardship” — Mark D. Wilkinson et al. (2016). *Scientific Data*, 3, 160018.  
  <https://doi.org/10.1038/sdata.2016.18>

- Getty Vocabularies (AAT, ULAN, TGN) — Getty Research Institute.  
  <https://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/>

- Wikidata: a free and open knowledge base — Wikidata Community.  
  <https://www.wikidata.org/>

- The Virtual International Authority File (VIAF).  
  <https://viaf.org/en>
